channel.title: pi4 on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in pi4 on Blog

item.title: Mining on a Raspberry PI4
item.description: I have an extra Raspberry Pi4 doing basically nothing, and with the Nano R4S on its way to replace my router I’d soon have 2 Pi4 doing nothing, so until I find a purpose for them, why not get them to mine a bit! I’ve been a huge fan of Monero, I like everything of it, from the name (in Esperanto, a language that I have been slowly trying to learn) to its superb privacy.
